key.enchdesc.title: Enchantment Descriptions
enchantment.travel_anchors.teleportation: Allows the enchanted item to work in place of a teleportation staff.
enchantment.coldenchants.summoner.desc: Has a chance to summon a Guardian that will help you in battle.
enchantment.coldenchants.cat_paw.desc: Creepers run away in fear from the wearer.
enchantment.coldenchants.poison_cloud.de: Attacks have a chance to summon a Poison Cloud that affects non-players.
enchantment.coldenchants.slowing.desc: Has a chance to slow the target.
enchantment.coldenchants.juggernaut.desc: Sprinting will cause the wearer to Smash through solid blocks at the cost of Durability.
enchantment.coldenchants.radiance.desc: Attacks have a chance to summon a Healing Cloud around you for a short time.
enchantment.coldenchants.vampiric.desc: Attacking Living Creatures replenishes your Hunger. Be weary of the Undead!
enchantment.coldenchants.phantom.desc: The Wearer is no longer prey to Phantoms and Becomes Invisible at night.
enchantment.coldenchants.elder_protectio: The Wearer becomes immune to the Elder Guardians Mining Fatigue effect.
enchantment.coldenchants.berserker.desc: Each piece of armor worn will amplify your direct damage.
enchantment.coldenchants.slimy.desc: When applied on specific Armor Slots will have a unique effect.
enchantment.coldenchants.death_wish.desc: The less Health you have, the more damage you deal.
enchantment.coldenchants.hearthing.desc: Allows you to use the compass to teleport to a set location.
enchantment.coldenchants.experienced.des: Grants a chance to drop an experience bottle at your feet when you successfully attack an entity.
enchantment.coldenchants.smithing.desc: Regenerates your durability with each exp orb you collect.
enchantment.coldenchants.restfull.desc: Wake up feeling refreshed with full Health and some nice buffs.
enchantment.origins.water_protection.des: Protects the user from water contact damage.
enchantment.create.potato_recovery.desc: Potato Cannon ammo has a chance to drop as an item rather than be consumed.
enchantment.create.capacity.desc: Allows the Backtank to hold more pressurized air.
enchantment.oriacs.flying_protection.des: Protects the user from damage received by flying into obstacles.
enchantment.hunterillager.bounce.desc: Increases how much boomerangs will bounce off walls.
Attacks do more damage against illager.
enchantment.organics.digging.desc: The tool will mine in a 3x3 area.
enchantment.organics.meteorological_abso: Gives the user beneficial effects in bad weather.
enchantment.organics.ender_phasing.desc: Prevents knockback while sneaking but makes you vulnerable to water.
enchantment.mythicbotany.hammer_mobility: Increases the attack speed of hammers.
enchantment.netheragriculture.health_ste: Heals the user when attacking a mob.
enchantment.grapplemod.wallrunenchantmen: Allows the user to run on walls.
enchantment.grapplemod.doublejumpenchant: Allows the user to jump twice.
enchantment.grapplemod.slidingenchantmen: Allows the user to slide using built up momentum.
enchantment.pyromancer.lightspeed.desc: Increases attack speed but lowers the amount of damage.
enchantment.pyromancer.hook.desc: Attacks move you towards the target.
enchantment.pyromancer.yatagarasu.desc: Attacks will spread damage from burning enemies.
enchantment.pyromancer.breakthrough.desc: Attacking a shielded target will temporarily disable their shield.
enchantment.pyromancer.blazing_wounds.de: Attacking a burning target will make them burst with magma.
enchantment.pyromancer.scalding_spikes.d: Attacks will cause streams of fire to erupt from the target.
enchantment.pyromancer.volcanic_mark.des: Targets hit by the projectile will be weaker to melee attacks.
enchantment.pyromancer.rush.desc: Increases damage if you are faster than the target.
enchantment.pyromancer.two_handed.desc: Increases damage when the offhand is empty.
enchantment.pyromancer.goliath_slayer.de: Projectiles deal more damage to larger enemies.
Grants immunity to wither. Increases resistance to damage and regeneration while in lava.
enchantment.pirates_armoury.oceans_aegis: Increases resistance to damage and grants immunity to nausea and mining fatigue when in water or an ocean biome.
